Container.Name: mariadb
Container.Overview: MariaDB is a community-developed fork of the MySQL relational database management system.

Config.Name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
Config.Description: This variable is mandatory and specifies the password that will be set for the MariaDB root superuser account.

Config.Name: MYSQL_DATABASE
Config.Description: This variable is optional and allows you to specify the name of a database to be created on image startup. If a user or password was supplied then that user will be granted superuser access to this database.

Config.Name: MYSQL_USER
Config.Description: This user will be granted superuser permissions for the database specified by the MYSQL_DATABASE variable.

Config.Name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
Config.Description: This sets the password for the MYSQL_USER.

Config.Name: traefik.enable
Config.Description: Set to true to enable this container in Traefik.
